entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
